comments:
I20071101-2000

- import org.eclipse.jdt.ui as source
- open plugin.xml on Source tab
- drag and drop the attached plugin.xml onto the org.eclipse.jdt.ui project
- click 'Yes' to overwrite
- quickly hover somewhere in the plug-in source editor (after clicking 'Yes', my mouse was already over the first occurrence of 'location' in the file)

Depending on the state of the universe, I get one of the two NPEs below. The problem is most probably that two threads are accessing the same FindReplaceDocumentAdapter concurrently.

Exception in thread "org.eclipse.jface.text.reconciler.MonoReconciler" java.lang.NullPointerException
